snippet: Brandon Jacobs, who said what he thought — not always what fans wanted to hear — but who ultimately helped the Giants win two Super Bowls as a bulldozing running back, was released by the team on Friday.
abstract: Brandon Jacobs, who said what he thought — not always what fans wanted to hear — but who ultimately helped the Giants win two Super Bowls as a bulldozing running back, was released by the team on Friday.

headline.main: Giants Release Jacobs; Should Jets Consider Signing Him?
